peril.helpers

Class ModelStateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.ModelStateHelper

  • public class ModelStateHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for Game this object stores the instances of the various ModelStates.
    Since:
    2018-02-06
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Attack attack
      The state that displays combat to the user.
      Fortify fortify
      The state which lets the user move ModelArmy's ModelUnit(s) from one ModelCountry to another.
      Reinforce reinforce
      The state that allows the ModelPlayer to distribute their ModelArmy to the ModelCountrys they rule.
      Setup setup
      The state that will allow the user to set up which ModelPlayer owns which ModelCountry.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelStateHelper(Attack combat, Reinforce reinforcement, Setup setup, Fortify movement)
      Constructs a new ModelStateHelper.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAll()
      Clears the selected ModelCountrys from all the ModelStates.

        Constructs a new ModelStateHelper.

        combat - The state that displays combat to the user.
